archimate:DataObject.name: MonitoredMetricObjectCriterion
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A MonitoredMetricObjectCriterion defines the scope of monitored objects for which a MeasurementJob is executed. The scope is either defined: â€¢ by a filter on a Class (sub-class MonitoredMetricClassCriterion) â€¢ or by a list of instances (sub-class MonitoredMetricInstanceCriterion).
